ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Rogues and bards (was Why didn't I log out sooner?)
ygData.msgSnippet: (stealing all their copper that, in not very many levels, they ll be tossing in piles on the ground anyway??? And that if they are true newbies worrying about
ygData.messageBody:
(stealing all their copper that, in not very many levels, they'll be
tossing in piles on the ground anyway??? And that if they are
true newbies worrying about that!)

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Randy Keith [mailto:Kalekona@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, June 13, 2000 9:57 AM

>Rogues,
>
>They are by far the best friends of all Fear/snare capable classes.
>
>Unfortunatly, most newbies are scared that the rogue's are
>stealing all thier copper that they cannot see
>them for the tanks/damage dealers they are. The Pickpocket skill
>is so misunderstood it is not even funny.
